#summary Instructions on how to use our tools.

This is a multi-class SVM classifier for "Big Data" on Hadoop.

  * [HowtoComputerKernel How to compute a big kernel matrix]
  * [CascadeSVMTrain How to train a binary classifier]
  * [CascadeTest How to do the prediction]
  * [CiteCascadeSVM How to cite this tool]
  <wiki:comment>* [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/cascadesvm_discussion Discussion Group for Q&A]</wiki:comment>


Resources:

[http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~lujiang/resources/cascadesvm_appendix.pdf The proof of the convergence to the global optimal solution].
